flavor_text:
Born on a cold seafloor, it
will swim great distances to
return to its birthplace.

Water makes up 80% of its body.
This Pokémon is easily affected by
its environment.

It is born with a wondrous power
that lets it bond with any kind of
Pokémon.

It starts its life with a wondrous power
that permits it to bond with any kind
of Pokémon.

that permits it to bond with any kind
of Pokémon.

that lets it bond with any kind of
Pokémon.
